ygData.subject: Heritrix 1.14.0-RC1 Release Candidate now available

Subject: Heritrix 1.14.0-RC1 Release Candidate now available

A release candidate build for the upcoming Heritrix 1.14.0 release is 
now available at SourceForge:

https://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=73833&package_id=73980&release_id=587316

Release 1.14.0 adds a number of small features to the Heritrix 1.x line, 
most notably upgrading support for the WARC archived-web-content format 
to version 0.17 (ISO Committee Draft). This release also includes 41 bug 
fixes or other incremental improvements, including several based on 
community contributions or requests.

Draft online release notes for 1.14.0 are available at:

http://webteam.archive.org/confluence/display/Heritrix/Release+Notes+-+1.14.0

If you have the chance, please give this code a try with your typical
configurations and let us know of any issues that should be addressed in
release notes or with urgent fixes.

Project bug/issue tracking is in a JIRA-based system:

http://webteam.archive.org/jira/browse/HER

The project wiki is at:

http://webteam.archive.org/confluence/display/Heritrix

If you register to report/comment on JIRA issues, the same login will
work for wiki edits and comments.

- Gordon @ IA
